sentences.sentence: If an indexer is not maintaining the index, it might be a good idea to contract an indexer to review it every year or so.
sentences.translation: 如果标引人员不对索引进行维护，最好让该索引人员能够大约每年对该索引进行定期检查。

sentences.sentence: Since the indexer is only one part of the pipeline a Tweet has to make it through, we needed the indexer itself to have a sub-second latency.
sentences.translation: 由于索引器本身只是推消息处理过程中的一个环节，所以光索引器本身的延时必须保证在亚秒级别。

sentences.sentence: The formal parameters of the C# indexer become the parameters of the corresponding UML operation and the type of the indexer becomes the return type of the UML operation.
sentences.translation: C# 索引器的形式参数成为相应的 UML 操作的参数，而索引器的类型成为 UML 操作的返回类型。
